results.title: ‘Speaker of the Knesset Medal’: PM Modi Receives Israel’s Premier Parliamentary Award
results.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has been awarded the “Speaker of the Knesset Medal” during his speech at Israel’s parliament on Wednesday. This honor marks a historic moment as he becomes the first Prime Minister of India to receive such an accolade. results.title: CRM Stock falls as Salesforce gives weak 2027 forecast despite strong earnings
results.description: CRM stock fell after Salesforce gave a weak future revenue forecast. Investors are worried about slow business software demand and heavy AI spending. Even though the company reported strong earnings and growth, the outlook disappointed the market. Salesforce is focusing on AI technology and long-term plans to increase revenue in the coming years.
keywords: crm stock,crm stock,salesforce 2027 revenue forecast,salesforce stock price drop,salesforce stock,crm,salesforce earnings,crm stock fall,crm stock price,salesforce
creator: durva more

results.title: App-solutely unhealthy: Glued to screens, teens’ health at risk
results.description: Excessive screen time is causing a surge in mental health issues among children, including addiction, anxiety, and suicidal tendencies. Governments are considering social media bans, but experts urge a multi-faceted approach involving education, parental guidance, and regulated screen time to avoid unintended negative consequences.

results.title: Centre appoints Rajya Sabha MP Satnam Sandhu as member of ‘India-Egypt Friendship Group’
results.description: CHANDIGARH, Feb 25: Rajya Sabha MP Satnam Singh Sandhu has been appointed as a member of the ‘India-Egypt Parliamentary Friendship Group’ formed by the Union government to boost the bilateral and parliamentary ties between the two countries. Sandhu’s nomination to the group was conveyed through an official communication issued by the Lok Sabha Secretariat, a statement said on Wednesday. The parliamentary group has been constituted with Egypt for the period of the 18th Lok Sabha. Expressing gratitude to the Union [...]The post Centre appoints Rajya Sabha MP Satnam Sandhu as member of ‘India-Egypt Friendship Group’ appeared first on Daily Excelsior.
creator: daily excelsior
